user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the TYNDP 2026 scenario specifications.

tasks.description: Create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate scenarios and years to generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles.

tasks.description: Split the nodes based on the created demand profiles.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Use the generated hydrogen demand profiles to identify and split the corresponding nodes.

tasks.description: Convert the resulting hydrogen demand profiles into the TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the output from the previous tasks, convert the profiles to the required TST format.
